env::git.help: Path to the Git executable. Auto-detected if empty.

env::latexmlc.help: Path to the latexmlc executable. Auto-detected if empty.

env::pdflatex.help: Path to the pdflatex executable. Auto-detected if empty.

env::perl.help: Path to the perl executable. Auto-detected if empty.

env::wget.help: Path to the wget executable. Auto-detected if empty.

env::mmt.help: Path to the MMT script. Uses the package installed by lmh seup if empty.

env::cpanm.help: Path to the cpanm executable. Auto-detected if empty.

env::pager.help: A full path to a pager to use for long outputs. If empty, no pager is used.

install::sources.help: Url prefixes to clone git repositories from. Seperated by ;s.

setup::latexml::branch.help: Default branch for latexml. Automatically uses the remote HEAD if undefined.

setup::latexmls::branch.help: Default branch for latexmls. Automatically uses the remote HEAD if undefined.

setup::latexmlstex::branch.help: Default branch for LaTeXML-Plugin-sTeX. Automatically uses the remote HEAD if undefined.

setup::latexmlkwarc::branch.help: Default branch for LaTeXML-Plugin-sTeX. Automatically uses the remote HEAD if undefined.

setup::stex::branch.help: Default branch for sTeX. Automatically uses the remote HEAD if undefined.

setup::mmtjar::source.help: Default Source for the MMT jar source.

setup::unmanaged.help: Comma seperated list of unmanaged packages.

gl::private_token.help: Gitlab Private token for gitlab interaction. Leave blank to prompt for username / password.

gl::host.help: Host for gitlab interaction. Should have a final slash.

gl::deploy_branch_name.help: Name for automatically created deploy branches.

mh::issue_url.help: URL to issues page for each repository.

init::allow_nonempty.help: Allow to run lmh init in non-empty directories.

gen::default_workers.help: Default number of workers to use for generating pdf and omdoc.

gen::pdf::timeout.help: Timeout when generating PDFs. In seconds.

gl::status_remote_enabled.help: If set to true, enables lmh status remote checking by default.
